description: Country music singer Garth Brooks has scheduled two December shows in North Little Rock, his first in the city in more than 23 years, Verizon Arena announced Wednesday morning.
title: Garth Brooks sets 2 concert dates in North Little Rock
title_page: Garth Brooks sets 2 concert dates in North Little Rock
text:
Country music singer Garth Brooks has scheduled two December shows in North Little Rock, his first in the city in more than 23 years, Verizon Arena announced Wednesday morning.
The Garth Brooks World Tour, which began Sept. 4, also features wife Trisha Yearwood. The North Little Rock shows, the first in Arkansas, are set for 7 p.m. Dec. 12 and Dec. 13, the arena said in a statement.
Tickets, which run $73.25 apiece, go on sale at 10 a.m. Nov. 7. Tickets are available through Ticketmaster via ticketmaster.com or by calling (800) 745-3000 or (866) 448-7849.
